item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.content:encoded:
Sure, Here is what the syntax looks like

The only difference is the COLUMNSTORE word

CREATE NONCLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX [ix_TestColumnStore] ON [dbo].[TestColumnStore]
(
id, SomeDate,Somevalue,Somevalue2
)WITH (DROP_EXISTING = OFF) ON [PRIMARY]

GO

— create vanilla index
CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX [ix_TestColumnStore] ON [dbo].[TestRowStore]
(
id, SomeDate,Somevalue,Somevalue2
)WITH (DROP_EXISTING = OFF) ON [PRIMARY]

GO
